title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 27.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 27.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

The Federal Surface Transportation Assistance Act of 1982
and the Federal Tax Reform Act of 1984 provide for the imposition of a tax on
the use of heavy vehicles and require a state to receive proof of compliance
prior to the issuance of a registration for such a heavy
vehicle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
27.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
